https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ykD32wsWXGIoLyi9d2PyANwwWfu.jpg Diamonds and switchblades are a girl's best friend. Inspired by Mario Bava's Blood and Black Lace, Edgar Wright's Last Night in Soho and many many sleazy gialli of the 70s. A Stranger Calls from Beyond the Crimson Room
